description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Stevenage v Bristol Rovers in League One
title: Stevenage v Bristol Rovers: League One stats & head-to-head
title_page: Stevenage v Bristol Rovers: League One stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Stevenage are winless in their last three league meetings with Bristol Rovers (D1 L2), losing 3-2 most recently in February 2024.
Bristol Rovers are unbeaten in all three away league visits to Stevenage (W2 D1), winning the last two while scoring seven goals in the process.
In their first 10 seasons in the Football League, Stevenage won their final league game of the year just twice (L8) but have since done so in three of the last four years (D1).
